CustomField.description: This field is getting used in visualforce page "icPaymentInvoicePDF" for generation of Account Payment Invoices.
CustomField.formula: IF( Contractor__r.Name !='APPLICANTS', IF(ISPICKVAL(Contractor__r.BillingCountryCode,'CA'), '1600 42nd Avenue SE', IF(ISPICKVAL(Contractor__r.BillingCountryCode,'US'),'6 Denny Road, Suite 104', '')), IF(CONTAINS(Applicant__r.Country_Code_Applicant__c,'CA'), '1600 42nd Avenue SE', IF(CONTAINS(Applicant__r.Country_Code_Applicant__c,'US'),'6 Denny Road, Suite 104', '')))
CustomField.label: HIDDEN Field City Street
